title: RLDA Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for General Manager Posts
description: The Rail Land Development Authority (RLDA) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 General Manager Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech and MBA students can apply for the RLDA Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, app...
